story.description: You enter Greenshop to buy groceries for the week. After entering, you grab a shopping cart and make your way into the dairy section

items.name: Whole milk
items.description: A gallon of Greenshop-brand whole milk
items.notes: Kids need the calcium and vitamin D in milk.

items.name: Yogurt
items.notes: It's not as healthy as organic greek yogurt, but the kids need something for their snack time at school. The past few weeks, they haven't been taking anything.

items.name: Greek Yogurt
items.notes: Protein rich - a healthy option for the childens' snacktime at school

story.description: You've entered the frozen food isle. On one hand, there are frozen dinners, and on the other, there are frozen vegetables
